properties.entry: DefaultExcelFormatter: This Style does not belong to the supplied Workbook.

Following exception is thrown when DefaultExcelFormatter (e.g. INSTANCE) is reused for a different workbook:
SEVERE: This Style does not belong to the supplied Workbook. Are you trying to assign a style from one workbook to the cell of a differnt workbook? java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: This Style does not belong to the supplied Workbook. Are you trying to assign a style from one workbook to the cell of a differnt workbook? at org.apache.poi.hssf.usermodel.HSSFCellStyle.verifyBelongsToWorkbook(HSSFCellStyle.java:770) at org.apache.poi.hssf.usermodel.HSSFCell.setCellStyle(HSSFCell.java:887) at org.apache.poi.hssf.usermodel.HSSFCell.setCellStyle(HSSFCell.java:883) at csv.impl.DefaultExcelFormatter.setStyle(DefaultExcelFormatter.java:164) at csv.impl.ExcelWriter.setStyle(ExcelWriter.java:394) at csv.impl.ExcelWriter.setValue(ExcelWriter.java:240) at csv.impl.ExcelWriter.setValue(ExcelWriter.java:219) at csv.impl.ExcelWriter.printRow(ExcelWriter.java:156) at csv.impl.ExcelWriter.printRow(ExcelWriter.java:140)
